name: excel-to-markdown-table
title: Excel-to-Markdown-Table
description: Effortlessly convert Excel tables to Markdown format! Simply copy your Excel table, run this plugin, and paste the Markdown table wherever you need. Streamline your workflow with one-click transformation.
author: shaojie_li

commands.name: excel-to-markdown-table
commands.title: Excel-to-Markdown-Table
commands.description: Convert Excel tables to Markdown format with just one click. Perfect for documentation and note-taking.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
